title: Skin concept! Bee Keeper Malzahar
body:
So recently I've been trying out {{champion:90}} and might I say..... He is SO MUCH FUN. And I took a look at his skins..... though they disappointed me (Apart from the Djinn and Snowdown skins) and I wondered what other concepts could work well for the prophet of the void. Eventually I grew bored and went to the internet, where I found an old meme and instantly thought of this. The whole 'NOT THE BEES!!!!' thing got the gears turning in my brain and I had to say this.

Malzahar NEEDS.... or would look good with, a Bee Keeper skin. 

Here's what I'm thinking:
Passive Voidling - Ok, this was difficult to think of, but I say either a fat bee, or some sort of bee/voidling hybrid. Or a bee pattern voidling if that's too much. But it'd be nice having a pet that could float around with Mal.
Q - Two bee hives appear and a swarm of bees make a wall that fly past and then back to where the hives were, or they just disperse.
W - A big puddle of honey appears on the ground that can then sink back into the ground afterwards. Pretty simple,
E - Literally, Bees. Big swarm of bees around the victim's head. 
R - Either a stream of honey being shot at the victim, or just a line of bees being shot at the enemy and holding them down. 

Voice clips:
Moving/Walking/Floating - "This is going to sting...."
Taunts - "Death as sweet as honey...." "Yes! Yes the Bees!" <---- (Reference to the 'NOT THE BEES' quote) "Float like a butterfly.... sting WITH the bees..."

Also his clothes and the way his mouth is always covered just suits the Beekeeper look. Slap on a Bee Keeper's uniform on him and call it a done deal because this is brilliant! I think..... My friends think so.

replies.body: I'm sorry. *Gives honey..... in the form of Malzahar's 'E' >:D* Ok, jk about the Mal 'E'.
that sounds like one of the coolest skins ever!!!
:D I think it'd be cool too
this would be rather nice to see i like the idea :)
